Package service.impl

Class CompanyRepresentativeServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
service.impl.CompanyRepresentativeServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompanyRepresentativeService
@Service public class CompanyRepresentativeServiceImpl extends Object implements CompanyRepresentativeService
Implementation of CompanyRepresentativeService. Handles business logic for company representatives managing internship opportunities.
Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6

    • createOpportunity

      public InternshipOpportunity createOpportunity(CompanyRepresentative representative, InternshipOpportunity opportunity)
      Description copied from interface: CompanyRepresentativeService
      Creates a new internship opportunity. Validates business rules: - Representative is approved - Maximum 5 opportunities per representative - Valid opportunity data
      Specified by:
      createOpportunity in interface CompanyRepresentativeService
      Parameters:
      representative - The company representative creating the opportunity
      opportunity - The internship opportunity to create
      Returns:
      The created InternshipOpportunity object

    • viewApplicationsForOpportunity

      public List<ApplicationWithStudentDTO> viewApplicationsForOpportunity(CompanyRepresentative representative, String opportunityId)
      Description copied from interface: CompanyRepresentativeService
      Views all applications for a specific internship opportunity with student details. Only accessible by the representative who created the opportunity.
      Specified by:
      viewApplicationsForOpportunity in interface CompanyRepresentativeService
      Parameters:
      representative - The company representative
      opportunityId - The ID of the internship opportunity
      Returns:
      List of applications with student details for the opportunity

    • convertToApplicationWithStudentDTO

      private ApplicationWithStudentDTO convertToApplicationWithStudentDTO(Application application)
      Converts an Application to ApplicationWithStudentDTO with student details.
      Parameters:
      application - the application to convert
      Returns:
      ApplicationWithStudentDTO with student details

    • handleApplicationDecision

      public void handleApplicationDecision(CompanyRepresentative representative, String applicationId, boolean approve)
      Description copied from interface: CompanyRepresentativeService
      Approves or rejects a student application. Validates: - Application exists and is for rep's opportunity - Application is in PENDING status - Opportunity has available slots (for approval)
      Specified by:
      handleApplicationDecision in interface CompanyRepresentativeService
      Parameters:
      representative - The company representative making the decision
      applicationId - The ID of the application
      approve - true to approve, false to reject

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility(CompanyRepresentative representative, String opportunityId, boolean visibility)
      Description copied from interface: CompanyRepresentativeService
      Toggles visibility of an internship opportunity. Only approved opportunities can have visibility toggled.
      Specified by:
      toggleVisibility in interface CompanyRepresentativeService
      Parameters:
      representative - The company representative
      opportunityId - The ID of the internship opportunity
      visibility - The new visibility setting

    • viewMyOpportunities

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> viewMyOpportunities(CompanyRepresentative representative)
      Description copied from interface: CompanyRepresentativeService
      Views all internship opportunities created by a representative.
      Specified by:
      viewMyOpportunities in interface CompanyRepresentativeService
      Parameters:
      representative - The company representative
      Returns:
      List of the representative's internship opportunities

    • updateOpportunity

      public void updateOpportunity(CompanyRepresentative representative, InternshipOpportunity opportunity)
      Description copied from interface: CompanyRepresentativeService
      Updates an existing internship opportunity. Can only update opportunities that are PENDING or REJECTED. Rejected opportunities will be reset to PENDING status when edited and resubmitted. Approved opportunities cannot be edited.
      Specified by:
      updateOpportunity in interface CompanyRepresentativeService
      Parameters:
      representative - The company representative
      opportunity - The updated internship opportunity

    • deleteOpportunity

      public void deleteOpportunity(CompanyRepresentative representative, String opportunityId)
      Description copied from interface: CompanyRepresentativeService
      Deletes an internship opportunity. Can delete opportunities that are: - PENDING or REJECTED (before approval) - APPROVED but past the closing date (no longer accepting applications)
      Specified by:
      deleteOpportunity in interface CompanyRepresentativeService
      Parameters:
      representative - The company representative
      opportunityId - The ID of the internship opportunity to delete
